Name: Miss Kelly
Text: Welcome to the emporium of [rainbow freq=0.25 sat=.5 val=1.2]dying!!!!![/rainbow]

Name: Miss Kelly
Text: Today we are going to get rid of some [wave amp=40 freq=4][fade start=0 length=12][b]roots...[/b][/fade][/wave]

Name: Miss Kelly
Text: You need to guess the [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=.5 val=1.1]hexadecimal[/rainbow] value of our customer desired color!

Name: Miss Kelly
Text: Just type the [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=.5 val=1.1]hex string[/rainbow] in the text field and press [b]ENTER[/b] to dye the hair!!
